# Number of lines of code in make: 5
sub make {
  my $self = (shift)->SUPER::make(@_);
  $self->{isValue} = $self->{isScientificNotation} = 1;
  return $self;
}

public method ScientificNotation::Real::string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in string: 8
sub string {
  my $self = shift;
  my $digits = $self->getFlag("snDigits");
  my $trim = ($self->getFlag("snTrimZeros") ? '0*' : '');
  my $r = main::spf($self->value,"%.${digits}e");
  $r =~ s/(\d)${trim}e\+?(-?)0*(\d)/$1 x 10^$2$3/i;
  return $r;
}
public method ScientificNotation::Real::TeX (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in TeX: 6
sub TeX {
  my $r = (shift)->string;
  $r =~ s/x/\\times /;
  $r =~ s/\^(.*)/^{$1}/;
  return $r;
}

# Number of lines of code in typeMatch: 4
sub typeMatch {
  my $self = shift; my $other = shift; my $ans = shift;
  return $other->{isScientificNotation};
}
